title: Vuelta a España: Storer hails Lenny Martinez’s stint in race lead, praises Groupama’s young riders
content:
Michael Storer on 20-year-old teammate's breakout Vuelta: 'He has been riding above expectations, way, way above, so no regrets.'

Read the full article at Vuelta a España: Storer hails Lenny Martinez’s stint in race lead, praises Groupama’s young riders on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
